protocol.name: P-GSE44307-1
protocol.text: Background correction and Robust Multi-array Average (RMA) normalization were performed within the “R” program using “affy” and limma packages. ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA normalized

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-2
protocol.text: Salt treatment day 6: Same composition as growth solution supplemented with 25 mM NaCl and 0.22 mM CaCl2 (see Note 2), pH 5.7 (with 10 M KOH); Salt treatment day 7: Same composition as growth solution supplemented with 50 mM NaCl and 0.375 mM CaCl2, pH 5.7 (with 10 M KOH).

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-3
protocol.text: Sterilised Arabidopsis seeds germinated and grown for 5 or 7 days in 1/4X MS basal salt mixture, 1 X Gamborg’s B5 vitamin solution, 0.5% sucrose, 0.05% MES, pH 5.7 (with 10 M KOH).

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-4
protocol.text: Roots were protoplasted for 30min in (400 mM mannitol, 20 mM MES hydrate, 20 mM KCl, 1.25% Cellulase R10, 0.3% Macerozyme R10. Adjust pH to 5.7 with 1 M Tris pH 8. Heat 10 min in 60 °C water bath, cool to room temperature while stirring. Add 10 mM CaCl2 , 0.1% BSA and 1.79 µl of β-mercapoethanol), RNA was extracted using a kit (RNeasy Micro kit, Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-5
protocol.text: cDNA was labeled and sheared using the FL-Ovation™ cDNA Biotin Module V2 (NuGEN technologies, USA).

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on ATH1 GeneChip. GeneChips were washed with Gene Chip Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE44307-7
protocol.text: Chips were scanned with GeneChip Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix, USA).
